"Beverly": "My pal's always climbing up to the top of the city. Says the view's incredible."
"I think you can get up near the entrance, or even around back. But you won't catch me tryin' that."
"Why not...? Duh. It's scary as hell!"
"Hey, you know that big building to the northeast? The giant one with the pointy top."
"It's called the 'Trinitas', and it's a special kind of Trainia."
"Why don't you try it out? Just don't hop in there if you're only gonna half-ass it."
"Huh? You want me to go too?"
"Why not...? Duh. It's scary as hell!"
"What, you chicken? Fine, maybe another time."
"Whoa! You're crazy dude. That was so sick!"
"I need to get my ass in gear. Someday I wanna train in there too."
"...The hell? You've already been there? Well say so next time, man!"
"But that's still crazy. I need to get my ass in gear too."
